name: Dengeki Bunko: Fighting Climax Ignition
overview: Dengeki Bunko: Fighting Climax IGNITION is the first major revision of DFC. DFCI added 4 new playable characters, 8 new assists, and new gameplay mechanics, among other changes. Unlike the first Dengeki Bunko, Ignition was never localized. However, an unofficial English patch for PS3 as well as a modified arcade rip with English translations and rollback netcode are available.
